long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a cat lover? Do you want to learn something new every time you open a new tab? Look no further than our Chrome extension that delivers a new cat fact every time you open a new tab! With this extension, you’ll never run out of interesting tidbits about our feline friends. From their history and behavior to their quirks and habits, this extension has it all. You’ll be amazed at how much there is to learn about cats and how much fun it can be to discover new facts.

Our team of experts has carefully curated a collection of the most fascinating and entertaining cat facts from around the world. Each fact is verified for accuracy and presented in an easy-to-read format. You’ll be able to impress your friends with your newfound knowledge and maybe even teach them a thing or two.

But that’s not all. This extension is more than just a collection of facts. It’s also designed to brighten your day and bring a smile to your face. Each fact is accompanied by a cute and colorful image of a cat, making it even more enjoyable to learn something new.

And the best part? This extension is completely free! You can enjoy all the benefits of learning about cats without spending a single penny. So why wait? Download our Chrome extension today and start discovering the wonderful world of cats!
